synopsis.text:
Masks gang and the rogue police force commanding the intimidating Demon 463 armored train.

In a city shrouded in whispers and veiled by purple smoke, detective Soutarou finds himself grappling with a perplexing wave of inexplicable disappearances. With no leads and no witnesses, the only clue is the enigmatic 'ominous tracks' that seem to be connected to the vanishings. In his quest for answers, Soutarou is drawn into the city's underbelly, a lawless labyrinth known as 'Kuragari.' Here, he crosses paths with the menacing Laughing Masks gang and the formidable Tanne, the commander of the black iron armored train. As he delves deeper into the mystery, his fate hangs in the balance, forever altered by his encounters in the shadowy world of Kuragari.

In this thrilling anime, join Soutarou and his young assistant Saki as they navigate the treacherous maze of the city's underground, where danger lurks around every corner and the truth is more elusive than ever. Will they solve the mystery of the mass disappearances, or will they too fall victim to the darkness that lies beneath the city? Only time will tell in this gripping tale of mystery and adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
